iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Serbia
iati-activity.description: In the frame of project activities, the UCRC will design and deliver the training to the children of secondary schools. The main themes that will be covered by the training sessions will be: 1.Child rights 2.Introduction of the Protocol on prevention of child abuse, neglect and violence in context of child rights; 3.Action planning. The trainings will last for three days and they will be delivered for each of five secondary schools (15 days of trainings in total). The overall objective of the project is to build sustainable capacities in secondary schools for protection, promotion and implementation of child rights.
